content: 1 Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus､ through God’s will, Unto the saints who are in Ephesus and faithful in Christ Jesus,—
content_old: 1 Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus､ through God’s will, Unto the saints who are in Ephesus and faithful in Christ Jesus,—

content: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 2 Favour unto you､ and peace, From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.

content: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ､ Who hath blessed us with every spiritual blessing､ in the heavenlies､ in Christ,
content_old: 3 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ､ Who hath blessed us with every spiritual blessing､ in the heavenlies､ in Christ,

content: 4 According as he made choice of us､ in him､ before the founding of a world､ That we might be holy and blameless in his presence; In love
content_old: 4 According as he made choice of us､ in him､ before the founding of a world､ That we might be holy and blameless in his presence; In love

content: 5 marking us out beforehand unto sonship､ through Jesus Christ､ for himself, According to the good pleasure of his will,
content_old: 5 marking us out beforehand unto sonship､ through Jesus Christ､ for himself, According to the good pleasure of his will,

content: 6 Unto the praise of the glory of his favour wherewith he favoured us in the Beloved One,—
content_old: 6 Unto the praise of the glory of his favour wherewith he favoured us in the Beloved One,—

content: 7 In whom we have the redemption through his blood､ the remission of our offences, According to the riches of his favour､
content_old: 7 In whom we have the redemption through his blood､ the remission of our offences, According to the riches of his favour､

content: 8 which he made to superabound towards us; In all wisdom and prudence
content_old: 8 which he made to superabound towards us; In all wisdom and prudence

content: 9 making known to us the sacred secret of his will, According to his good pleasure which he purposed in him,—
content_old: 9 making known to us the sacred secret of his will, According to his good pleasure which he purposed in him,—

content: 10 For an administration of the fulness of the seasons to､ reunite for himself (under one head) the all things in the Christ, The things upon the heavens､ And the things upon the earth, In him:
content_old: 10 For an administration of the fulness of the seasons to､ reunite for himself (under one head) the all things in the Christ, The things upon the heavens､ And the things upon the earth, In him:

content: 11 In whom also we were taken as an inheritance, According to the purpose of him who energiseth all things according to the counsel of his will,
content_old: 11 In whom also we were taken as an inheritance, According to the purpose of him who energiseth all things according to the counsel of his will,

content: 12 That we should be for the praise of his glory— We who had hoped beforehand in the Christ,—
content_old: 12 That we should be for the praise of his glory— We who had hoped beforehand in the Christ,—

content: 13 In whom ye also— Hearing the word of the truth､ the glad-message of your salvation,— In whom also believing— Were sealed with the Spirit of the promise､ the Holy Spirit,
content_old: 13 In whom ye also— Hearing the word of the truth､ the glad-message of your salvation,— In whom also believing— Were sealed with the Spirit of the promise､ the Holy Spirit,

content: 14 Which is an earnest of our inheritance､ Unto the redemption of the acquisition;— Unto his glorious praise.
content_old: 14 Which is an earnest of our inheritance､ Unto the redemption of the acquisition;— Unto his glorious praise.

content: 15 For this cause I also— Having heard of the faith on your part in the Lord Jesus､ and that towards all the saints
content_old: 15 For this cause I also— Having heard of the faith on your part in the Lord Jesus､ and that towards all the saints

content: 16 Cease not giving thanks in your behalf, Making mention in my prayers､
content_old: 16 Cease not giving thanks in your behalf, Making mention in my prayers､

content: 17 That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ､ the Father of glory would give you a Spirit of wisdom and understanding in gaining a personal knowledge of him,—
content_old: 17 That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ､ the Father of glory would give you a Spirit of wisdom and understanding in gaining a personal knowledge of him,—

content: 18 The eyes of your heart having been enlightened､ That ye may know— What is the hope of his calling, What the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,
content_old: 18 The eyes of your heart having been enlightened､ That ye may know— What is the hope of his calling, What the riches of the glory of his inheritance in the saints,

content: 19 And what the surpassing greatness of his power unto us who believe,—— According to the energy of the grasp of his might
content_old: 19 And what the surpassing greatness of his power unto us who believe,—— According to the energy of the grasp of his might

content: 20 which he energised in the Christ､ When he raised him from among the dead, And seated him at his right hand in the heavenlies､
content_old: 20 which he energised in the Christ､ When he raised him from among the dead, And seated him at his right hand in the heavenlies､

content: 21 Over-above all principality､ authority､ and power､ and lordship, and every name that is named､ not only in this age､ but also in the coming one,
content_old: 21 Over-above all principality､ authority､ and power､ and lordship, and every name that is named､ not only in this age､ but also in the coming one,

content: 22 And did put all things in subjection beneath his feet. And gave him to be head over all things unto the assembly,
content_old: 22 And did put all things in subjection beneath his feet. And gave him to be head over all things unto the assembly,

content: 1 Unto you also— Being dead by your offences and sins,
content_old: 1 Unto you also— Being dead by your offences and sins,

content: 2 In which at one time ye walked､ According to the age of the world､ According to the prince of the authority of the air､ of the spirit that now energiseth in the sons of disobedience,
content_old: 2 In which at one time ye walked､ According to the age of the world､ According to the prince of the authority of the air､ of the spirit that now energiseth in the sons of disobedience,

content: 3 Among whom also we all had our behaviour､ at one time､ in the covetings of our flesh, doing the things desired by the flesh and the mind, And were children､ by nature､ of anger—even as the rest,—
content_old: 3 Among whom also we all had our behaviour､ at one time､ in the covetings of our flesh, doing the things desired by the flesh and the mind, And were children､ by nature､ of anger—even as the rest,—

content: 4 But God Being rich in mercy By reason of the great love wherewith he loved us
content_old: 4 But God Being rich in mercy By reason of the great love wherewith he loved us

content: 5 Although we were dead by our offences Gave us life together with the Christ,— By favour ye have been saved,—
content_old: 5 Although we were dead by our offences Gave us life together with the Christ,— By favour ye have been saved,—

content: 6 And raised us up together, And seated us together in the heavenlies､ In Christ:
content_old: 6 And raised us up together, And seated us together in the heavenlies､ In Christ:

content: 7 That he might point out､ in the oncoming ages､ The surpassing riches of his favour in graciousness upon us､ In Christ Jesus;
content_old: 7 That he might point out､ in the oncoming ages､ The surpassing riches of his favour in graciousness upon us､ In Christ Jesus;

content: 8 For by his favour have ye been saved､ through means of faith, And this hath come to pass— Not from you､ Of God the free-gift!
content_old: 8 For by his favour have ye been saved､ through means of faith, And this hath come to pass— Not from you､ Of God the free-gift!

content: 9 Not from works, lest anyone should boast.
content_old: 9 Not from works, lest anyone should boast.

content: 10 His in fact we are—his workmanship, Created in Christ Jesus upon a footing of good works､ Which God prepared beforehand, That therein we might walk.
content_old: 10 His in fact we are—his workmanship, Created in Christ Jesus upon a footing of good works､ Which God prepared beforehand, That therein we might walk.

content: 11 Wherefore､ keep in remembrance— That at one time ye､ the nations in flesh Who are called Uncircumcision by the so-called Circumcision in flesh､ made by hand
content_old: 11 Wherefore､ keep in remembrance— That at one time ye､ the nations in flesh Who are called Uncircumcision by the so-called Circumcision in flesh､ made by hand

content: 12 That ye were in that season､ Separate from Christ, Alienated from the citizenship of Israel､ and strangers from the covenants of promise, Having no hope And godless in the world;
content_old: 12 That ye were in that season､ Separate from Christ, Alienated from the citizenship of Israel､ and strangers from the covenants of promise, Having no hope And godless in the world;

content: 13 But just now､ in Christ Jesus､ Ye､ who at one time were afar off Were made nigh in the blood of the Christ;
content_old: 13 But just now､ in Christ Jesus､ Ye､ who at one time were afar off Were made nigh in the blood of the Christ;

content: 14 He in fact､ is our peace— Who made both one､ And the enclosing middle-wall took down､
content_old: 14 He in fact､ is our peace— Who made both one､ And the enclosing middle-wall took down､

content: 15 The enmity､ in his flesh—the law of commandments in decrees—bringing to nought,— That the two he might create in himself､ into one man of new mould, Making peace.
content_old: 15 The enmity､ in his flesh—the law of commandments in decrees—bringing to nought,— That the two he might create in himself､ into one man of new mould, Making peace.

content: 16 And might fully reconcile them both､ in one body､ through means of the cross,— Slaying the enmity thereby;—
content_old: 16 And might fully reconcile them both､ in one body､ through means of the cross,— Slaying the enmity thereby;—

content: 17 And coming he announced the glad-message— Of peace unto you､ the far off, And peace unto them that were nigh;
content_old: 17 And coming he announced the glad-message— Of peace unto you､ the far off, And peace unto them that were nigh;

content: 18 Because through him we have our introduction— we both—in one Spirit､ unto the Father.
content_old: 18 Because through him we have our introduction— we both—in one Spirit､ unto the Father.

content: 19 Hence､ then— No longer are ye strangers and sojourners, But ye are fellow-citizens of the saints､ And members of the household of God,—
content_old: 19 Hence､ then— No longer are ye strangers and sojourners, But ye are fellow-citizens of the saints､ And members of the household of God,—

content: 20 Having been built up on the foundation of the apostles and prophets, There being for chief corner stone Jesus Christ himself,—
content_old: 20 Having been built up on the foundation of the apostles and prophets, There being for chief corner stone Jesus Christ himself,—

content: 21 In whom an entire building､ In process of being fitly joined together. Is growing into a holy shrine in the Lord;
content_old: 21 In whom an entire building､ In process of being fitly joined together. Is growing into a holy shrine in the Lord;

content: 1 For this cause I､ Paul､ the prisoner of Christ Jesus in behalf of you the nations:———
content_old: 1 For this cause I､ Paul､ the prisoner of Christ Jesus in behalf of you the nations:———

content: 2 If at least ye have heard of the administration of the favour of God which hath been given unto me for you,
content_old: 2 If at least ye have heard of the administration of the favour of God which hath been given unto me for you,

content: 3 How that by way of revelation was made known unto me the sacred secret,— Even as I before wrote in brief,—
content_old: 3 How that by way of revelation was made known unto me the sacred secret,— Even as I before wrote in brief,—

content: 4 Respecting which ye can by reading perceive my discernment in the sacred secret of the Christ,—
content_old: 4 Respecting which ye can by reading perceive my discernment in the sacred secret of the Christ,—

content: 5 Which in other generations had not been made known unto the sons of men､ As it hath now been revealed by his holy apostles and prophets､ in Spirit;—
content_old: 5 Which in other generations had not been made known unto the sons of men､ As it hath now been revealed by his holy apostles and prophets､ in Spirit;—

content: 6 That they who are of the nations should be joint heirs､ and a joint body､ and joint partakers of the promise in Christ Jesus through means of the glad-message,—
content_old: 6 That they who are of the nations should be joint heirs､ and a joint body､ and joint partakers of the promise in Christ Jesus through means of the glad-message,—

content: 7 Of which I was made a minister､ according to the free-gift of the favour of God which was given unto me､ according to the energy of his power:
content_old: 7 Of which I was made a minister､ according to the free-gift of the favour of God which was given unto me､ according to the energy of his power:

content: 8 Unto me— The less than least of all saints Was given this favour､ Unto the nations to announce the glad-message of the untraceable riches of the Christ,
content_old: 8 Unto me— The less than least of all saints Was given this favour､ Unto the nations to announce the glad-message of the untraceable riches of the Christ,

content: 9 And to bring to light—What is the administration of the sacred secret which had been hidden away from the ages in God､ who did all things create:
content_old: 9 And to bring to light—What is the administration of the sacred secret which had been hidden away from the ages in God､ who did all things create:

content: 10 In order that now､ unto the principalities and the authorities in the heavenlies､ might be made known, through means of the assembly, the manifold wisdom of God,—
content_old: 10 In order that now､ unto the principalities and the authorities in the heavenlies､ might be made known, through means of the assembly, the manifold wisdom of God,—

content: 11 According to a plan of the ages which he made in the anointed Jesus our Lord,—
content_old: 11 According to a plan of the ages which he made in the anointed Jesus our Lord,—

content: 12 In whom we have our freedom of speech and introduction with assurance､ through the faith of him;—
content_old: 12 In whom we have our freedom of speech and introduction with assurance､ through the faith of him;—

content: 13 Wherefore I request､ that there be no fainting in my tribulations in your behalf, The which is your glory;—
content_old: 13 Wherefore I request､ that there be no fainting in my tribulations in your behalf, The which is your glory;—

content: 14 For this cause､ I bow my knees unto the Father､—
content_old: 14 For this cause､ I bow my knees unto the Father､—

content: 15 From whom every fatherhood in the heavens and upon the earth is named､—
content_old: 15 From whom every fatherhood in the heavens and upon the earth is named､—

content: 16 In order that he may give unto you— According to his glorious riches With power to be strengthened､ through his Spirit､ in the inner man,
content_old: 16 In order that he may give unto you— According to his glorious riches With power to be strengthened､ through his Spirit､ in the inner man,

content: 17 That the Christ may dwell､ through moans of your faith､ in your hearts､ in love, Having become rooted and founded,
content_old: 17 That the Christ may dwell､ through moans of your faith､ in your hearts､ in love, Having become rooted and founded,

content: 18 In order that ye may be mighty enough To grasp firmly､ with all the saints､— What is the breadth and length and depth and height,
content_old: 18 In order that ye may be mighty enough To grasp firmly､ with all the saints､— What is the breadth and length and depth and height,

content: 19 To get to know､ also､ the knowledge-surpassing love of the Christ,— In order that ye may be filled unto all the fulness of God:
content_old: 19 To get to know､ also､ the knowledge-surpassing love of the Christ,— In order that ye may be filled unto all the fulness of God:

content: 20 Now unto him who is able to do above all things､ Exceeding abundantly above the things which we ask or conceive,— According to the power which doth energise itself within us,—
content_old: 20 Now unto him who is able to do above all things､ Exceeding abundantly above the things which we ask or conceive,— According to the power which doth energise itself within us,—

content: 1 I exhort you､ therefore､ I､ the prisoner in the Lord To walk in a manner worthy of the calling wherewith ye were called;—
content_old: 1 I exhort you､ therefore､ I､ the prisoner in the Lord To walk in a manner worthy of the calling wherewith ye were called;—

content: 2 With all lowliness and meekness､ With long suffering, Bearing one with another in love,
content_old: 2 With all lowliness and meekness､ With long suffering, Bearing one with another in love,

content: 3 Giving diligence to keep— The oneness of the Spirit in the uniting-bond of peace,—
content_old: 3 Giving diligence to keep— The oneness of the Spirit in the uniting-bond of peace,—

content: 4 One body､ and one spirit､ even as ye were also called in one hope of your calling,
content_old: 4 One body､ and one spirit､ even as ye were also called in one hope of your calling,

content: 5 One Lord､ one faith､ one immersion,
content_old: 5 One Lord､ one faith､ one immersion,

content: 6 One God and Father of all— Who is over all､ and through all､ and in all.
content_old: 6 One God and Father of all— Who is over all､ and through all､ and in all.

content: 7 To each one of you however､ hath favour been given､ According to the measure of the free-gift of the Christ;
content_old: 7 To each one of you however､ hath favour been given､ According to the measure of the free-gift of the Christ;

content: 8 Wherefore he saith— Ascending on high he took captivity captive､ And gave gifts unto men.
content_old: 8 Wherefore he saith— Ascending on high he took captivity captive､ And gave gifts unto men.

content: 9 Now this､ He ascended; what is it､—save—That he also descended into the under parts of the earth?
content_old: 9 Now this､ He ascended; what is it､—save—That he also descended into the under parts of the earth?

content: 10 He that descended he it is who also ascended over-above all the heavens, That he might fill all things;
content_old: 10 He that descended he it is who also ascended over-above all the heavens, That he might fill all things;

content: 11 And he gave— Some､ indeed､ to be apostles, And some､ prophets, And some､ evangelists, And some､ shepherds and teachers,—
content_old: 11 And he gave— Some､ indeed､ to be apostles, And some､ prophets, And some､ evangelists, And some､ shepherds and teachers,—

content: 12 With a view to the fitting of the saints For the work of ministering, For an upbuilding of the body of the Christ;
content_old: 12 With a view to the fitting of the saints For the work of ministering, For an upbuilding of the body of the Christ;

content: 13 Until we all advance— Into the oneness of the faith､ and the personal knowledge of the Son of God, Into a man of full-growth, Into the measure of the stature of the fulness of the Christ;
content_old: 13 Until we all advance— Into the oneness of the faith､ and the personal knowledge of the Son of God, Into a man of full-growth, Into the measure of the stature of the fulness of the Christ;

content: 14 That we may no longer be infants—Billowtossed and shifted round with every wind of teaching,—In the craft of men､ In knavery suited to the artifice of error;
content_old: 14 That we may no longer be infants—Billowtossed and shifted round with every wind of teaching,—In the craft of men､ In knavery suited to the artifice of error;

content: 15 But pursuing truth— May in love grow into him in all things,— Who is the head, Christ,—
content_old: 15 But pursuing truth— May in love grow into him in all things,— Who is the head, Christ,—

content: 16 Out of whom all the body— Fitly framing itself together､ And connecting itself, Through means of every joint of supply, By way of energising in the measure of each single part— Secureth the growing of the body､ Unto an upbuilding of itself in love.
content_old: 16 Out of whom all the body— Fitly framing itself together､ And connecting itself, Through means of every joint of supply, By way of energising in the measure of each single part— Secureth the growing of the body､ Unto an upbuilding of itself in love.

content: 17 This therefore､ am I saying and protesting in the Lord:— That no longer ye walk even as the nations walk— In the vanity of theiy minds,
content_old: 17 This therefore､ am I saying and protesting in the Lord:— That no longer ye walk even as the nations walk— In the vanity of theiy minds,

content: 18 Being darkened in their understanding､ Alienated from the life of God— By reason of the ignorance that existeth within them､ By reason of their hearts being turned into stone,
content_old: 18 Being darkened in their understanding､ Alienated from the life of God— By reason of the ignorance that existeth within them､ By reason of their hearts being turned into stone,

content: 19 Who､ indeed､ having become past feeling have delivered themselves up､ with wantonness､ unto making a trade of all impurity with greed.
content_old: 19 Who､ indeed､ having become past feeling have delivered themselves up､ with wantonness､ unto making a trade of all impurity with greed.

content: 20 Ye however､ have not thus learned the Christ:—
content_old: 20 Ye however､ have not thus learned the Christ:—

content: 21 If､ at least､ it is him ye have heard､ And in him ye have been taught— Even as truth is In Jesus,—
content_old: 21 If､ at least､ it is him ye have heard､ And in him ye have been taught— Even as truth is In Jesus,—

content: 22 That ye were to strip off—as regardeth the former behaviour—the old man､ Who corrupteth himself according to his deceitful covetings,
content_old: 22 That ye were to strip off—as regardeth the former behaviour—the old man､ Who corrupteth himself according to his deceitful covetings,

content: 23 And were to be getting young again in the spirit of your mind,
content_old: 23 And were to be getting young again in the spirit of your mind,

content: 24 And were to put on the man of new mould､ Who after God hath been created in his truthful righteousness and loving kindness.
content_old: 24 And were to put on the man of new mould､ Who after God hath been created in his truthful righteousness and loving kindness.

content: 25 Wherefore stripping off what is false Be speaking truth each one with his neighbour, Because we are members one of another;
content_old: 25 Wherefore stripping off what is false Be speaking truth each one with his neighbour, Because we are members one of another;

content: 26 Be ye angry､ and not committing sin, Let not the sun be going down upon your angry mood､
content_old: 26 Be ye angry､ and not committing sin, Let not the sun be going down upon your angry mood､

content: 27 Neither be giving place unto the adversary;
content_old: 27 Neither be giving place unto the adversary;

content: 28 Let the stealer no more steal, But rather let him be toiling,— Working with his hands the thing that is good､ That he may have wherewith to be giving away to him that hath need;
content_old: 28 Let the stealer no more steal, But rather let him be toiling,— Working with his hands the thing that is good､ That he may have wherewith to be giving away to him that hath need;

content: 29 Let no putrid discourse out of your mouth be going forth, But if anything is good—suited to the needful upbuilding､— That it may give benefit unto them that hear;
content_old: 29 Let no putrid discourse out of your mouth be going forth, But if anything is good—suited to the needful upbuilding､— That it may give benefit unto them that hear;

content: 30 And be not grieving the Holy Spirit of God, Wherewith ye have been sealed unto a day of redemption;
content_old: 30 And be not grieving the Holy Spirit of God, Wherewith ye have been sealed unto a day of redemption;

content: 31 All bitterness､ and wrath､ and anger､ and outcry､ and profane speaking let it be taken away from you, With all baseness;
content_old: 31 All bitterness､ and wrath､ and anger､ and outcry､ and profane speaking let it be taken away from you, With all baseness;

content: 1 Become ye､ therefore､ imitators of God､ as children beloved,
content_old: 1 Become ye､ therefore､ imitators of God､ as children beloved,

content: 2 And walk in love— Even as the Christ also loved you､ And delivered himself up in your behalf, An offering and sacrifice unto God､ For a fragrance of sweet smell.
content_old: 2 And walk in love— Even as the Christ also loved you､ And delivered himself up in your behalf, An offering and sacrifice unto God､ For a fragrance of sweet smell.

content: 3 But fornication､ and all impurity, or covetousness Let it not be named among you— Even as becometh saints;
content_old: 3 But fornication､ and all impurity, or covetousness Let it not be named among you— Even as becometh saints;

content: 4 And shamelessness and foolish talking､ or jesting,— Which things are beneath you,— But rather giving of thanks;
content_old: 4 And shamelessness and foolish talking､ or jesting,— Which things are beneath you,— But rather giving of thanks;

content: 5 For this ye know､ if ye take note— That no fornicator､ or impure or greedy person､ Who is an idolater､ Hath any inheritance in the kingdom of the Christ and God.
content_old: 5 For this ye know､ if ye take note— That no fornicator､ or impure or greedy person､ Who is an idolater､ Hath any inheritance in the kingdom of the Christ and God.

content: 6 Let no one be deceiving you with empty words; For because of these things is coming the anger of God upon the sons of obstinacy:
content_old: 6 Let no one be deceiving you with empty words; For because of these things is coming the anger of God upon the sons of obstinacy:

content: 7 Do not､ then､ become co-partners with them;
content_old: 7 Do not､ then､ become co-partners with them;

content: 8 For ye were､ at one time､ darkness, But now are ye light in the Lord,— As children of light be walking,—
content_old: 8 For ye were､ at one time､ darkness, But now are ye light in the Lord,— As children of light be walking,—

content: 9 For the fruit of the light is in all goodness､ and righteousness､ and truth,—
content_old: 9 For the fruit of the light is in all goodness､ and righteousness､ and truth,—

content: 10 Putting to the test what is well-pleasing unto the Lord;
content_old: 10 Putting to the test what is well-pleasing unto the Lord;

content: 11 And be not joining in fellowship in the unfruitful works of darkness, But rather be even administering reproof;
content_old: 11 And be not joining in fellowship in the unfruitful works of darkness, But rather be even administering reproof;

content: 12 For of the secret things which are brought to pass by them it is shameful even to speak!
content_old: 12 For of the secret things which are brought to pass by them it is shameful even to speak!

content: 13 All things however､ when reproved by the light become manifest, For all that of itself maketh manifest is light;
content_old: 13 All things however､ when reproved by the light become manifest, For all that of itself maketh manifest is light;

content: 14 Wherefore it saith— Up! thou sleeper､ And arise from among the dead, And the Christ will shine upon thee.
content_old: 14 Wherefore it saith— Up! thou sleeper､ And arise from among the dead, And the Christ will shine upon thee.

content: 15 Be taking heed､ therefore､ exactly how ye are walking,— Not as unwise､ But as wise,—
content_old: 15 Be taking heed､ therefore､ exactly how ye are walking,— Not as unwise､ But as wise,—

content: 16 Buying out for yourselves the opportunity､ because the days are evil;
content_old: 16 Buying out for yourselves the opportunity､ because the days are evil;

content: 17 For this cause do not become foolish, but have discernment as to what is the will of the Lord;
content_old: 17 For this cause do not become foolish, but have discernment as to what is the will of the Lord;

content: 18 And be not getting drunk with wine､ in which is dissoluteness, But be getting filled in Spirit;—
content_old: 18 And be not getting drunk with wine､ in which is dissoluteness, But be getting filled in Spirit;—

content: 19 Speaking to yourselves､ with psalms and hymns and spiritual songs; Singing､ and striking the strings､ with your heart, unto the Lord;
content_old: 19 Speaking to yourselves､ with psalms and hymns and spiritual songs; Singing､ and striking the strings､ with your heart, unto the Lord;

content: 20 Giving thanks､ always､ for all things､ In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ Unto your God and Father;
content_old: 20 Giving thanks､ always､ for all things､ In the name of our Lord Jesus Christ Unto your God and Father;

content: 21 Submitting yourselves one to another In reverence of Christ,———
content_old: 21 Submitting yourselves one to another In reverence of Christ,———

content: 22 Ye wives､ unto your own husbands､ as unto the Lord,
content_old: 22 Ye wives､ unto your own husbands､ as unto the Lord,

content: 23 Because a husband is the head of his wife､ As the Christ also is the head of the assembly, He being the saviour of the body､—
content_old: 23 Because a husband is the head of his wife､ As the Christ also is the head of the assembly, He being the saviour of the body､—

content: 24 Nevertheless as the assembly submitteth herself unto the Christ so the wives､ unto their husbands in everything:
content_old: 24 Nevertheless as the assembly submitteth herself unto the Christ so the wives､ unto their husbands in everything:

content: 25 ye husbands､ be loving your wives, Even as the Christ also loved the assembly､ and delivered himself up in her behalf,
content_old: 25 ye husbands､ be loving your wives, Even as the Christ also loved the assembly､ and delivered himself up in her behalf,

content: 26 That her he might sanctify､ Having purified her with the bath of water､ in declaration,
content_old: 26 That her he might sanctify､ Having purified her with the bath of water､ in declaration,

content: 27 That he might present unto himself the assembly all glorious､ not having spot or wrinkle or any of such things, but that she should be holy and blameless;
content_old: 27 That he might present unto himself the assembly all glorious､ not having spot or wrinkle or any of such things, but that she should be holy and blameless;

content: 28 So ought the husbands also to be loving their own wives as their own bodies,— He that loveth his own wife loveth himself,
content_old: 28 So ought the husbands also to be loving their own wives as their own bodies,— He that loveth his own wife loveth himself,

content: 29 No one in fact､ ever yet hated his own flesh, But nourisheth and cherisheth it,— Even as the Christ the assembly,
content_old: 29 No one in fact､ ever yet hated his own flesh, But nourisheth and cherisheth it,— Even as the Christ the assembly,

content: 30 Because members are we of his body;—
content_old: 30 Because members are we of his body;—

content: 31 For this cause will a man leave his father and his mother､ and will cleave unto his wife, And they two shall become one flesh.
content_old: 31 For this cause will a man leave his father and his mother､ and will cleave unto his wife, And they two shall become one flesh.

content: 32 This sacred secret is great,— I however､ am speaking as to Christ and as to the assembly;—
content_old: 32 This sacred secret is great,— I however､ am speaking as to Christ and as to the assembly;—

content: 1 Ye children､ be obedient unto your parents in the Lord, For this is right:
content_old: 1 Ye children､ be obedient unto your parents in the Lord, For this is right:

content: 2 Honour thy father and thy mother,— Which indeed is the first commandment with promise
content_old: 2 Honour thy father and thy mother,— Which indeed is the first commandment with promise

content: 3 That it may come to be well with thee､ And thou shalt be long-lived upon the land.
content_old: 3 That it may come to be well with thee､ And thou shalt be long-lived upon the land.

content: 4 And ye fathers､ be not provoking your children to anger, But be nourishing them up in the discipline and admonition of the Lord.
content_old: 4 And ye fathers､ be not provoking your children to anger, But be nourishing them up in the discipline and admonition of the Lord.

content: 5 Ye servants､ be obedient unto them who after the flesh are your masters､ With fear and trembling, In singleness of your heart､ as unto the Christ;
content_old: 5 Ye servants､ be obedient unto them who after the flesh are your masters､ With fear and trembling, In singleness of your heart､ as unto the Christ;

content: 6 Not by way of eye-service as man-pleasers, But as servants of Christ､ doing the will of God, From the soul､
content_old: 6 Not by way of eye-service as man-pleasers, But as servants of Christ､ doing the will of God, From the soul､

content: 7 with good will rendering service— As unto the Lord､ and not unto men;
content_old: 7 with good will rendering service— As unto the Lord､ and not unto men;

content: 8 Knowing that each one whatsoever he may do that is good the same shall he receive back from the Lord—Whether bond or free.
content_old: 8 Knowing that each one whatsoever he may do that is good the same shall he receive back from the Lord—Whether bond or free.

content: 9 And ye masters､ the same things be doing towards them, Forbearing your threat— Knowing that both their and your Master is in the heavens, And respect of persons there is none with him.
content_old: 9 And ye masters､ the same things be doing towards them, Forbearing your threat— Knowing that both their and your Master is in the heavens, And respect of persons there is none with him.

content: 10 For the rest Be empowering yourselves in the Lord､ and in the grasp of his might:
content_old: 10 For the rest Be empowering yourselves in the Lord､ and in the grasp of his might:

content: 11 Put on the complete armour of God, With a view to your having power to stand against the strategies of the adversary;
content_old: 11 Put on the complete armour of God, With a view to your having power to stand against the strategies of the adversary;

content: 12 Because our struggle is not against blood and flesh, But Against the principalities
content_old: 12 Because our struggle is not against blood and flesh, But Against the principalities

content: Against the authorities
content_old: Against the authorities

content: Against the world-holders
content_old: Against the world-holders

content: of this darkness､
content_old: of this darkness､

content: Against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenlies.
content_old: Against the spiritual forces of wickedness in the heavenlies.

content: 13 For this cause take up the complete armour of God, In order that ye may receive power to withstand in the evil day､ And all things having accomplished to stand!
content_old: 13 For this cause take up the complete armour of God, In order that ye may receive power to withstand in the evil day､ And all things having accomplished to stand!

content: 14 Stand､ therefore､— Having girded your loins with truth, And put on the breastplate of righteousness,
content_old: 14 Stand､ therefore､— Having girded your loins with truth, And put on the breastplate of righteousness,

content: 15 And shod your feet with the readiness of the glad-message of peace;
content_old: 15 And shod your feet with the readiness of the glad-message of peace;

content: 16 With all having taken up the shield of faith､ Wherewith ye shall have power all the ignited darts of the wicked one to quench;
content_old: 16 With all having taken up the shield of faith､ Wherewith ye shall have power all the ignited darts of the wicked one to quench;

content: 17 And the helmet of salvation welcome ye, And the sword of the spirit､ which is what God hath spoken,
content_old: 17 And the helmet of salvation welcome ye, And the sword of the spirit､ which is what God hath spoken,

content: 18 With all prayer and supplication praying in every season､ in spirit, And thereunto watching､ with all perseverance and supplication､ For all the saints,—
content_old: 18 With all prayer and supplication praying in every season､ in spirit, And thereunto watching､ with all perseverance and supplication､ For all the saints,—

content: 19 And on behalf of me;— That unto me may be given discourse in the opening of my mouth With freedom of utterance to make known the sacred secret of the glad-message
content_old: 19 And on behalf of me;— That unto me may be given discourse in the opening of my mouth With freedom of utterance to make known the sacred secret of the glad-message

content: 20 In behalf of which I am conducting an embassy in chains That therein I may use freedom of utterance as it is needful for me to speak.
content_old: 20 In behalf of which I am conducting an embassy in chains That therein I may use freedom of utterance as it is needful for me to speak.

content: 21 In order､ however､ that ye also may know the things which relate to me— what I am accomplishing—All things shall Tychicus make known unto you He the beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord,
content_old: 21 In order､ however､ that ye also may know the things which relate to me— what I am accomplishing—All things shall Tychicus make known unto you He the beloved brother and faithful minister in the Lord,

content: 22 Whom I have sent unto you for this very purpose, That ye may get to know the things concerning us､ And he may encourage your hearts.
content_old: 22 Whom I have sent unto you for this very purpose, That ye may get to know the things concerning us､ And he may encourage your hearts.

content: 23 Peace unto the brethren､ and love with faith,— From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.
content_old: 23 Peace unto the brethren､ and love with faith,— From God our Father､ and Lord Jesus Christ.
